name: JQ: chemistry
description: JQ: chemistry - is a quiz game about chemical elements in which a player must choose the correct answer from 4 options.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 25 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
